title: Shin Megami Tensei IV Compendium
description: I extracted sprite textures from a Nintendo 3DS game cartridge to provide game information in a visually appealing way. A backend provides game data and crops images to the contour with the largest area.
This game has an ability inheritance and fusion system with over 2000 fusions and I intend to expand on that in the future.

title: Reddit Data Mining
description: A script ran a daily API data collection and cleaning of 49 subreddits. The data was used to create visualizations in matplotlib from a sentiment analysis of the reddit comments.â€Ž
